title: Twitter Is Testing A Polling Feature for Its Website and Mobile Apps
text:
Macau Billionaire Jailed In U.S. Without Bail In Bribery Probe 26 September, 2015 
A source familiar with the matter said on Friday, billionaire Macau developer arrested for lying to U.S. customs officials about why he brought $4.5 million in cash into the United States was subpoenaed... More Kim Davis To Become A Republican 26 September, 2015 
Kentucky clerk Kim Davis a longtime Democrat says she is switching to the Republican Party because she feels abandoned by Democrats in her fight against same-sex marriage. Davis made the announcement... More Pope Francis Brings His Message To The UN 26 September, 2015 
Pope Francis arrived at the United Nations on Friday morning for a speech to the General Assembly that will touch on the need for peace and the plight of refugees among other topics. Secretary-General... More
